titleStmt.title: An account of prodigious storms of thunder, lightning, &c. near London-Derry in Ireland On Saturday June 26, 1680. As they were communicated to a friend in London by the following letters.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for B. Tooke, in St. Paul's church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
